messages.message:
Hey team! For the postman collection, the `Context` variable should be passed into the header for every endpoint but it's missing from multiple ones:
• upload file/upload file (commercial)
• run app with batch
• get job status
• ...
Could we double-check on this and add it to every endpoint? I'm hoping that this will make it easier for customers to use our APIs!
Thank you!

Is the context variable needed for all endpoints?
I added it to the endpoints based on the docs.
For example:
The FS api like upload file make no mention of context
https://platform.instabase.com/docs/aihub/apis/api-reference/filesystem-v2/index.html

We should provide this in all endpoints invoked in aihub context. If not provided, it fallbacks to the community context. It might be okay for certain endpoints (like the FS apis), but it's good to require this for all endpoints.
@Anil I think this is what happened with batch API with Hamish where it defaults to community context and a user isn't made aware that they need to send in their commercial context
